body:
joined avicus a few years ago
i got banned
and im back after 6 months of waiting! HOORAY!
now i need to get my friend unbanned....

title: YES I KNEW IT

replies.body: You can tell your friend, to create a forums account and Submit an Appeal.

replies.body: Welcome back! But please don't post personal updates on the forums ;) feel free to turn this into an AMA, or a reintroduction, but if not I'd have to lock it.

replies.body: YAY welcome back! i have no idea who you are, but i hope your freind gets unbanned! good luck!
